---
title: "Version 2.2 of the schema"
date: 2025-06-27
categories: [OAI-PMH]
---

New schema for AMCR OAI-PMH API is released ([v2.2](https://api.aiscr.cz/schema/amcr/2.2/), 2025-06-18).
This version contains only minor updates in the structure of the response.

**Changes**

- addition of element `email` in the set `ruian_kraj`
- change in some of the elements from `xs:string` to `xs:anyURI`

**URLs**

- Schema: [https://api.aiscr.cz/schema/amcr/2.2/](https://api.aiscr.cz/schema/amcr/2.2/), 
- Endpoint: `https://api.aiscr.cz/2.2/oai`
